title: Leaver Buster Low Priority Queue
body: Can we like be able to do what we want rather than stuck there for 10 minutes watching time go down. Honestly you're just pissing off other players. btw it was my cousin and not me who got it.

replies.body: Sharing an account is a bannable offence. Riot please ban this pleb
This doesn't mean OP was sharing an account with their cousin. LPQ affects EVERYONE who queues with someone who has it.
Well his cousin shouldn't be a piece of shit and leave games? Problem solved?
It's punishment. I'm sure you weren't expecting it to be pleasant.
punishment might be pleasent if its from his missus in the bedroom
The assumption here being that he has a missus, considering his complaining on boards, i think it's safe to say he doesn't.
Thats the issue, it makes people angry before the match even starts lmao.

It's something to think about on why your cousin was placed in low priority queue in the first place. Given the 10 minutes that he/she has, they should able to reflect on what happened from the past games played.
